resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4051</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transformation Geometry using CAD</string>
            <string language="es">Transformación de geometría utilizando CAD</string>
            <string language="ga">Geoiméadracht Trasfhoirmiú ag úsáid CAD</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation Geometrie mit CAD</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La géométrie de transformation en utilisant le 
DAO</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geometria da transformação usando o CAD</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La geometria di trasformazione usando cad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρία μετασχηματισμού που χρησιμοποιεί το CAD</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">CAD exercises, suitable for use by second year students, where a number of editing commands are used to perform "transformations" on a given figure.</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicios CAD, apropiados para que los usen los estudiantes de segundo año, donde se usan varios comandos de edición para realizar “transformaciones” en una figura dada.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceachtaí CAD, feiliúnach don dara bliain ina n-úsáidtear orduithe eagarthóireachta chun trasfhoirmithe a chur i bhfeidhm ar fhigiúr.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technical Graphics</string>
            <string language="es">Gráficos técnicos. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Grafaic Theicniúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cad trainiert, verwendbar für Gebrauch durch 
zweite Jahrkursteilnehmer, in denen eine Zahl des Bearbeitens von von 
Befehlen verwendet werden, um "Transformationen" auf einer gegebenen 
Abbildung durchzuführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le DAO s'exerce, approprié à l'usage des 
deuxièmes étudiants d'année, où un certain nombre de commandes 
d'édition sont utilisées comme moyen d'exécuter des 
"transformations" sur une figure donnée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O CAD exercita, apropriado para o uso pelos 
segundos estudantes do ano, onde um número de comandos de edição 
são usados executar "transformações" em uma figura dada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cad si esercita, adatto ad uso dei secondi 
allievi di anno, in cui un certo numero di comandi di stampa sono 
usati effettuare "le trasformazioni" su una data figura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις CAD, κατάλληλες προς χρήση από τους 
σπουδαστές του δεύτερου έτους, όπου διάφορες να επιμεληθούν 
εντολές χρησιμοποιούνται για να εκτελέσουν "τους μετασχηματισμούσ"
σε έναν δεδομένο αριθμό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technische Graphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphiques Techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráficos Técnicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafici Tecnici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνική γραφική παράσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
